criteria.description: Agent is ready and available to receive call
criteria.guideline: Agent answers the call promptly and is available to assist.
alternative_phrases: thanks for holding
I'm here to help
you're through to reservations

criteria.description: Must open the conversation with correct introduction
criteria.guideline: Thank you for calling Hotel Reservations, my name is [Name]. How may I assist you?
alternative_phrases: thanks for calling hotel reservations
this is [Name] how can i help
welcome to hotel reservations

criteria.description: Acknowledge guest's request, reiterating guest needs
criteria.guideline: Agent acknowledges and restates the caller’s reason to confirm understanding.
alternative_phrases: just to confirm you’re asking about
i get that you’re having an issue with
so the reason for your call is

criteria.description: Confirm and provide all relevant information before any process
criteria.guideline: Agent verifies guest first/last name, itinerary number, hotel name and dates before proceeding.
alternative_phrases: may i have your reservation or itinerary number
can i confirm the name on the booking
let me verify your check-in and check-out dates

criteria.guideline: Agent works efficiently and sets clear expectations (e.g., hold time, steps).
alternative_phrases: i’ll place you on a brief hold
this should take around two minutes
i’ll keep you updated if it takes longer

criteria.description: Explore solutions/alternatives and show ownership of the call
criteria.guideline: Agent explores all options, follows processes, and takes ownership.
alternative_phrases: here are your options
another solution is
i’ll own this and get it resolved

criteria.guideline: Agent maintains professional, courteous tone without jargon or slang.
alternative_phrases: certainly / absolutely (used professionally)
happy to assist
let me clarify that for you

criteria.guideline: Agent documents notes/actions accurately per process.
alternative_phrases: i’ve updated your reservation notes
adding a note now
this is recorded on your booking

criteria.description: Recap all relevant information and outcomes, set clear expectations
criteria.guideline: Agent summarizes actions/outcomes and confirms next steps and expectations.
alternative_phrases: just to summarize what we did
the next step is
you should get an email/confirmation
